snippet.title: Ballistix (amiga)
snippet.description:
Completing some of the first levels, there are many more. Gameplay isn't rewarding. I don't think 2p mode could be much more fun either. Lacks ingame music and title music is definitely not awesome. I cut out two goals which took a very long time so to keep this in one video.

Publisher: Psyclapse (1989)

http://www.lemonamiga.com/games/details.php?id=114
